name: Cat Crisis
description:
Do you ever wonder what it's like when you don't find a partner and adopt 26 cats instead? Find out in this funny game where you must keep all your cat's alive and try to have as many as possible!

The start is easy, but it gets hard really quickly!

Note: This is a pototype I made as part of the #OneMonthOneGame challenge. I am aware of some bugs still being in the game. If the game is loved, I will turn this little prototype in a real game with a lot more features and different levels! 

Let me know in the comments if you'd like this to turn into a real game!

Also post your highscores in the comments with a screenshot. The top 3 users will have their name in the game and can appear on a cat! (Untill 12/16/2019)

Check out my progress on future games: https://twitter.com/DaanTheDevDude

The Character I used is made by Quaternius. Go check out his patreon: https://www.patreon.com/quaternius

Music by https://www.bensound.com/

Controls:   (Made for Xbox Controller, Keyboard can be used)

Walk: Left Joystick / WASD

Interact: A / Left Mouse Button (Hold to interact)

Restart: R (Only On Keyboard)

Quit Game: Escape (Only on Keyboard)
